lore: The Destroyer Cults think nothing of sacrificing their physical forms to optimise themselves for slaughter. Lokhust Heavy Destroyers skim to battle upon repulsor-sled bodies, their upper limbs bound into gauss destructors or enmitic exterminators with which they decimate their foes with devastating blasts from afar.

faction: Optimised for Slaughter: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack with an enmitic exterminator against an INFANTRY unit
re-roll a Wound roll of 1. Each time a model in this unit makes an attack with a gauss destructor against a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit

wargear.description: Any number of models can each have their gauss destructor replaced with 1 enmitic exterminator.
